products.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo blackout scarlet red roller blind in red. Made to measure from 7.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This bold scarlet red roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This red roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.
 
 Product id: db-prbx0036 fabric colour: scarlet red material: 100% polyester lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Poppy Red - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Trinity (blackout), poppy red - roller blind trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new
products.productdescription: Trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new. The gentle weave sits in the background, but it's the homely red that really catches the eye.Matching to trinity (blackout) poppy red is all about taking the time to get the balance right. When the time comes to start considering which colours you want to pair it with, why not take a look at some sky blues and crisp greens? They'll provide a natural balance that really brings things together.

products.title: Harewood Blackout Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The brightly coloured harewood blackout red roller blind adds colour to any room. Now with free delivery on orders over 145, only at kingston blinds direct
products.productdescription: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it!

products.title: Konya Blackout Scarlett Red
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout scarlett red roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackout scarlett red plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Santiago Blackout Habanero Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Add a drop of warmth to your home with this spicy santiago habanero red roller blind. The rich red tone isn't just stylish it also brings with it a sense of cosiness and comfort. If sunlight is becoming a problem in your home, this fabric is perfect, offering blackout protection

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Geisha Red Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry blossom blackout geisha red roller blind in red/pink. Made to measure from 20.95 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches with a hint of red. Cherry blossom blackout geisha red blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Anthology (blackout), fired earth - roller blind fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interi
products.productdescription: Fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interiors. The reds and oranges are finely tempered by the strands of white that intricately weave their way through the fabric.Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed. It's all about celebrating different amplitudes of colour, so why not make this your next diy project?

products.title: Flash Red (4572) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure flash red (4572) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
